meta.videoTitle: Controlling Sugar Cravings & Metabolism with Science-Based Tools

paragraphList.text_en: The Brain-Body Contract is an innovative concept that brings attention to the intricate connection between our brain, body, and the choices we make regarding our health and well-being. As Dr. Huberman expresses, the decisions we make about the foods we consume play a crucial role in affecting our mental health, physical health, and overall performance. By understanding this contract, individuals can navigate their choices more effectively to benefit their well-being.
paragraphList.text_zh: 大脑-身体契约是一个创新概念，它引起了人们对大脑、身体以及我们在健康和幸福方面所做选择之间错综复杂连接的关注。正如胡伯曼博士所言，我们对所摄入食物所做的决定在影响我们的心理健康、身体健康和整体表现方面发挥着至关重要的作用。通过理解这种契约，个人可以更有效地指导自己的选择，使之有益于他们的幸福。

paragraphList.text_en: Dr. Huberman's upcoming live events in Seattle, Washington on May 17th and Portland, Oregon on May 18th are set to delve into the depths of The Brain-Body Contract. These events, part of a series of enlightening lectures, aim to provide attendees with scientific insights and tools to enhance their mental health, physical well-being, and performance levels. It is a unique opportunity to gain knowledge directly from an expert in the field and learn valuable information that can positively impact one's lifestyle choices.

文本：
Huberman博士将于5月17日在华盛顿州西雅图和5月18日在俄勒冈州波特兰举办即将举行的现场活动，旨在深入探讨“大脑-身体契约”的深度。这些活动是一系列富有启发性的讲座的一部分，旨在为与会者提供科学见解和工具，以增强他们的心理健康、身体健康和表现水平。这是一个独特的机会，可以直接获取来自该领域专家的知识，并学习有价值的信息，可以积极影响一个人的生活方式选择。

paragraphList.text_en: While some of the topics discussed during the live events may resonate with information shared on the Huberman Lab Podcast and Dr. Huberman's social media platforms, the content presented during these lectures will offer a fresh perspective and delve into new, distinct topics. Attendees can expect to receive valuable and exclusive information that goes beyond what has been shared elsewhere, providing them with a unique learning experience.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在直播活动中讨论的一些话题可能会与Huberman实验室播客和Huberman博士的社交媒体平台上分享的信息产生共鸣，但在这些讲座中呈现的内容将提供新鲜的观点并深入探讨新颖的话题。与会者可以期待收到有价值且独家的信息，超越了其他地方分享的内容，为他们提供独特的学习体验。

paragraphList.text_en: The Brain-Body Contract serves as a reminder of the crucial partnership between our brain and body, emphasizing the impact that our choices, particularly those related to diet and nutrition, have on our overall well-being. By attending Dr. Huberman's live events and immersing oneself in the knowledge and tools shared during these sessions, individuals can empower themselves to make informed decisions that promote mental clarity, physical health, and optimal performance.
paragraphList.text_zh: 大脑-身体契约作为提醒，提醒我们的大脑和身体之间至关重要的合作关系，强调我们的选择，特别是与饮食和营养有关的选择，对我们整体健康的影响。通过参加胡伯曼博士的现场活动，并沉浸自己于这些场次中分享的知识和工具中，个人可以赋予自己能力，做出促进思维清晰、身体健康和最佳表现的明智决定。
